a plant that has groups of three leaves with a single flower with three petals growing above them: Flowering plants such as trillium carpet the soft ground, all indicating a healthy forest. White trilliums decorated the side of the trail. The white trillium (trillium grandiflorum) is the state wildflower of Ohio, and the provincial flower of Ontario.
